meanings.sent1: The park was filled with excited cartwheelers showing off their skills.
meanings.sent2: The young cartwheelers practiced in the grassy field every afternoon.
meanings.sent3: The cartwheelers at the gym class made everyone smile with their flips.
meanings.sent4: The cartwheelers in the talent show spun like colorful tops on stage.
meanings.sent5: The cartwheelers in the parade dazzled the crowd with their acrobatics.

meanings.definition: A group of people who perform cartwheels together.
meanings.sent1: The schoolyard echoed with laughter as the cartwheelers tumbled in unison.
meanings.sent2: The team of cartwheelers amazed the audience with their synchronized routine.
meanings.sent3: The cartwheelers in the park formed a circle and rolled like a human wheel.
meanings.sent4: The cartwheelers at the festival moved like a spinning kaleidoscope.
meanings.sent5: The group of cartwheelers in the competition displayed perfect coordination.
